properties.Name: ChurnReasonPrevention
properties.Description: The action(s) that are appropriate for preventing a churn of a customer account due to the Churn Reason.

Columns.Name: ChurnReasonId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Churn Reason.

Columns.Name: ChurnPreventionId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Churn Prevention.

Columns.Name: ChurnReasonPreventionAnticipatedSuccessRate
Columns.Description: The historical success of preventing a customer account churn due to the churn reason by using the churn prevention action.

Columns.Name: ChurnReasonPreventionNote
Columns.Description: A note or statement regarding the Churn Reason Prevention.
